stats.activity_over_time_tooltip: Number of people taking your quiz over time.
stats.avg_time_spent_tooltip: Average amount of time people who completed the quiz have spent, from start to completion. The nature of averages can be skewed by outliers.
stats.completion_rate_tooltip: Percentage of people who started and then completed the quiz.
stats.completion_rates_tooltip: Percentage of people who started and then completed the quiz.
stats.completions_tooltip: Number of unique times the final question in a quiz was answered.
stats.contextual_offer_conversions_tooltip: The number of times an offer has been activated.
stats.contextual_offer_impressions_tooltip: The number of times an offer has been presented at the end of a quiz.
stats.contextual_offer_conversion_rate_tooltip: Offer conversions divided by the number of offer impressions.
stats.export_fail: An error exporting your data occurred, please try again later
stats.export_success: We'll email you a CSV shortly
stats.facebook_likes_tooltip: Number of people who liked your Facebook page at the end of the quiz.
stats.form_conversions_tootip: Number of times the form at the end of the quiz was filled in and submitted.
stats.lead_conversions_tooltip: Number of times the form at the end of the quiz was filled in and submitted.
stats.link_conversions_tooltip: Number of times a person clicked through the custom link at the end of the quiz.
stats.offer_conversions_tooltip: Number of times a person clicked through the custom link at the end of the quiz.
stats.score_distribution_tooltip: Percentage breakdown of how a question was answered. On graded quizzes, the percentage who answered correct is also shown.
stats.shares_tooltip: Number of times a share button on the widget was pressed.
stats.starts_tooltip: Number of times the quiz was first engaged with.
stats.times_taken_tooltip: Number of people who have started the quiz.
stats.views_tooltip: Number of times the quiz was loaded.
